name: e2e-detox
description: Web and Mobile testing with Detox

scripts.e2e:ipad: detox clean-framework-cache && detox build-framework-cache && DETOX_CONFIGURATION=ipad NODE_ENV=PLATFORM=ipad TEST_ENV=local cucumber-js --profile iosIpad --publish
scripts.e2e:ipad-focus: detox clean-framework-cache && detox build-framework-cache && DETOX_CONFIGURATION=ipad NODE_ENV=PLATFORM=ipad TEST_ENV=local cucumber-js --profile iosIpad --publish --tags @focus
scripts.e2e:iphone: detox clean-framework-cache && detox build-framework-cache && DETOX_CONFIGURATION=iphone NODE_ENV=PLATFORM=iphone TEST_ENV=local cucumber-js --profile iosIphone --publish
scripts.e2e:iphone-focus: detox clean-framework-cache && detox build-framework-cache && DETOX_CONFIGURATION=iphone NODE_ENV=PLATFORM=iphone TEST_ENV=local cucumber-js --profile iosIphone --tags @focus
